titles.title: Permanent End to TARP Act
To amend the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008 to terminate authority under the Troubled Asset Relief Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 9/28/2010--Introduced. Permanent End to TARP Act - Amends the Emergency Economic Stabilization Act of 2008 (EESA) to terminate the authority of the Secretary of the Treasury with respect to the Troubled Asset Relief Program (TARP) on October 3, 2010.
